cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 275 miles SSW of Nantucket, Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating northeastward just offshore of southeastern New England toward Nova Scotia and the Gulf of St. Lawrence

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane watches from Avonport to Hubbards NS, Prince Edward Island, Magdalen Islands and part of Newfoundland
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Woods Hole to Sagamore Beach MA, Nantucket & Martha’s Vineyard, and portions of eastern Maine; Hurricane Warning for eastern Nova Scotia
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeastern Massachusetts (Cape Cod and islands) northward to Downeast Maine and Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.wind: Low chance (≤7%) of sustained 34-kt winds; brief gusts 25–35 mph possible early Saturday morning
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for Boston Harbor with Dorian remaining well offshore
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–2 inches of rain possible as outer rainbands brush eastern Massachusetts
weather_observation.other_hazards: Large swells and dangerous rip currents along the Massachusetts coast
